function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncertainty about the efficacy and public acceptance of safety interventions in public transport","Impact":"Potential inability to reassure passengers and mitigate contagion risk","Mitigation":"Conduct surveys and studies to assess public acceptance, and communicate the efficacy of safety interventions to passengers","Technologies":"Surveys, data analytics, communication technologies","People":"Passengers, public transport operators, vehicle manufacturers","Owner":"Public transport operators, vehicle manufacturers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Significant impact on air passenger transport due to global transmission of the virus and travel restrictions","Impact":"Closure of airports, suspension of flight operations, reduction in passenger demand, furloughs and layoffs of staff","Mitigation":"Implement strict health and safety protocols, facilitate vaccine distribution, and provide financial support to affected staff and companies","Technologies":"Health monitoring technology, vaccine distribution logistics, financial support systems","People":"Passengers, airline staff, airport workers, airline companies","Owner":"Airline companies, airport authorities, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Uncertainty about the return of passenger air demand to pre-pandemic levels","Impact":"Continued financial instability for airlines, airports, and associated businesses","Mitigation":"Develop contingency plans, diversify revenue streams, and invest in alternative modes of transportation","Technologies":"Financial modeling tools, market analysis software, transportation infrastructure technology","People":"Airlines, airports, travel industry stakeholders","Owner":"Airlines, airport authorities, transportation authorities"}]}
